title: Australian ball tampering reaches cricket sponsors
text:
Australian ball tampering reaches cricket sponsors Monday, March 26, 2018 - 01:19 
Australia's major cricket sponsors, including Qantas Airways, breakfast cereal maker Sanitarium and brewer Lion, have said they are assessing their relationship with the country's favourite pastime as the fallout from a ball-tampering scandal escalates. Kate King reports, the incident also threatens to upset current negotiations over broadcast rights.
